name: Kokoro Kuesuto
description:
Kokoro Kuesuto is a short 20~30 minute hybrid between an RPG and a dating sim. Embark on a hilarious quest to save the world, while trying to find love in the process!

Features
  • No forced random encounters or grinding - Random encounters are optional, and it is possible to clear the game without them.
  • Several different endings - Five main endings, four secret joke endings.
Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to confirm / interact
  • X to cancel
